articles.author: Kate Nicholson
articles.content:
Liz Truss was outshone on stage by a lettuce banner.

articles.description: The ex-prime minister could not leaf fast enough.
articles.title: 'Not Funny!' Liz Truss Storms Off Stage As Lettuce Stunt Crashes Her 'Pro-Trump' Event

articles.description: "Apparently Trump and Putin talk to each other like Wayne and Garth," the comedian said of the former president's weird anecdote.
articles.title: Jimmy Fallon Left Momentarily Speechless By Trump's Wild Story About Putin
